header.title: Cowboy Bebop
header.description: Spike Spiegel and Jet Black are bounty hunters who travel through space in their ship, the Bebop. They are joined by Faye Valentine, Edward Wong, and Ein as they take on various missions.

list.title: Samurai Champloo
list.description: Fusing hip-hop and samurai culture, Samurai Champloo follows Mugen, Jin, and Fuu as they search for the samurai who smells of sunflowers.

list.title: A Place Further Than the Universe
list.description: Four girls embark on a journey to Antarctica to fulfill their dreams and discover themselves.

list.title: Spice and Wolf
list.description: Kraft Lawrence, a traveling merchant, meets the wolf deity Holo and they embark on a journey together.

list.title: Made in Abyss
list.description: Riko and Reg explore the mysterious Abyss, a massive chasm filled with strange creatures and relics.
